April 2022

Welcome to Your Justia Insights Newsletter 

Stay informed with the newsletter designed to bring updates and insights from our team directly to the Justia Connect community.

In this month’s edition, learn more about optimizing your website’s practice area pages for Google search results and check out law firm slogans from across the nation. Catch up on the latest news in law and technology, from the privacy lawsuits against Tesla to Netflix’s password-sharing crackdown, and find out how Justia showed a little extra appreciation to our team last month!

Featured News

Optimizing Your Law Firm Website Practice Area Pages for Google

As an attorney, you want to be visible in search engine results when someone in your area looks for help in your key practice areas. Optimizing your website content for Google and other search engines is critical to increasing your online visibility. Check out this post to learn more.

Law Firm Slogans Revisited: 50 Catchphrases From 50 States

Google Page Experience Update for Desktop Is Now Fully Rolled Out

After only nine days, Google confirmed that the Page Experience algorithm update for desktop is complete. Keep reading to learn more.

Justia Ask A Lawyer By the Numbers: Fourth Quarter 2021

We kicked off 2022 by checking out our data from 2021. Take a look at this post for the latest info about trends on the Justia Ask A Lawyer forum last year.

TikTok Alert: Maximum Video Length Expanding to 10 Minutes

TikTok, a popular video-based social media app, rose to popularity by offering short videos limited to one minute or less. After allowing all users to begin posting three-minute videos in July 2021, it looks like even longer videos are now coming to the platform.

Featured Justia Resources: Landlord-Tenant Law Center

Did you know that Justia offers numerous free resources to make the law more accessible and help people better understand the foundations of a variety of legal areas? In this post, you can learn more about the information available in Justia’s Landlord-Tenant Law Center.

Google Will Take Down Universal Analytics

Google announced that all Universal Analytics properties will be deprecated in favor of Google Analytics 4. Any properties utilizing Universal Analytics will stop processing hits in 2023. Keep reading to learn more.

4 Marketing Tips for Bankruptcy Lawyers

Are you a bankruptcy lawyer looking for a few ideas to revamp your legal marketing strategy? Read this post for four tips we suggest ensuring are a part of your well-rounded legal marketing plan.

Drafting Your Ideal Attorney Biography

Your attorney biography on various platforms is often the first introduction someone has to you as a lawyer. It is also frequently the most visible information about your professional persona. Check out this post to learn more about crafting a new bio or refreshing your old one this year.

Tip of the Month

PPC Marketing for Any Budget

Did you know Justia Amplify offers PPC management for any budget and up to $1,000 in Google Ads credit for clients new to PPC?

Choose Justia Amplify Advance if your monthly PPC budget is greater than $1,000/month and you want to advertise on various platforms. If your budget is smaller, choose Justia Amplify Starter to add Google Ads PPC to your marketing plan.
